	.guardian-cta__info-payment {
		display: inline-block;
		font-size: 0;
		margin: 0 auto 0 0;
		vertical-align: bottom;
	}

	.guardian-cta__info-payment img {
		width: 37px;
	}

	.guardian-cta__info-payment .payment-logo__content--paypal {
		width: 97px;
		margin-left: 9px;
	}

	.guardian-cta__info-payment .payment-logo__content--apple {
		width: 55px;
		margin-left: 7px;
		top: 2px;
		position: relative;
	}

	.guardian-cta__info-payment-logo--common {
		margin-left: 5px;
	}

	.guardian-cta__info-payment-logo--common:first-child {
		margin-left: 0;
	}

	.guardian-cta a.guardian-cta__button {
		border-radius: 20px;
		font-size: 16px;
		height: 40px;
		line-height: 40px;
		padding: 0 36px;
		text-align: center;
		text-decoration: none;
	}

	.guardian-cta__button .crux-icons:before {
		font-size: 15px;
		margin-left: 2px;
		top: 0;
	}

	@media (max-width: 767px) {
		.guardian-cta {
			margin-bottom: 40px;
			padding: 24px;
		}

		.guardian-cta__text {
			font-size: 16px;
			line-height: 24px;
		}

		.guardian-cta .guardian-cta__btn-style,
		.guardian-cta a.guardian-cta__button {
			height: 40px;
			line-height: 40px;
			padding: 0 20px;
		}

		.guardian-cta .guardian-cta__btn-style {
			margin-right: 3px;
		}

		.guardian-cta__bottom-block,
		.guardian-cta__info-payment {
			display: block;
		}

		.guardian-cta__info-payment {
			margin-bottom: 35px;
		}

		.guardian-cta__info-payment img {
			margin-bottom: 15px;
		}

		.guardian-cta__info-payment br+.payment-logo__content--paypal {
			margin-left: 0;
		}
	}

                <div class="cda-article__col cda-article__col-main">
                    <div class="cda-article__main-content">
                        <section id="intro" class="cda-article__intro ">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-12">
            <div class="crux-article">
                <p>Looking for a deal on an <a href="https://www.consumerreports.org/electronics-computers/cell-phones/iphone-15-lineup-drops-lightning-adopts-usb-c-a2241583701/">iPhone 15</a>? Apple’s new flagship phones are now available for pre-order for shipment beginning Friday, September 22, and wireless carriers are offering special incentives for new and existing customers.</p>
<p>The iPhone 15 (measuring 6.1 inches diagonally) and iPhone 15 Plus (6.7 inches) start at $799 and $899, respectively, with 128 gigabytes of storage. The iPhone 15 Pro (6.1 inches) and iPhone 15 Pro Max (6.7 inches) start at $999 and $1,199. While last year’s iPhone 14 Pro and Pro Max models both started with 128GB of storage, the 15 Pro Max starts with 256GB, raising the pricing floor by $100.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <section id="monetate-cta" class="inline-cta-marker"><div id="monetate_selectorHTML_bb3aaea_0" class="monetate_selectorHTML_bb3aaea"><div class="crux-background-gray-bg mt-inline-template-wrapper" id="mt-cr-magazine-cta">
<div class="row">
<div class="col-xs-12 col-12">
<div class="crux-marketing--title">The Truth Is in Our Testing</div>

<div class="crux-body-copy" style="padding: 16px 0;">Get what you need to know when it comes to tech and gadgets.</div>
<a class="crux-btn crux-btn-special--lg mt-inline-template-btn" href="https://www.consumerreports.org/join/?INTKEY=I82LA02">Join</a></div>
</div>
</div>
</div></section>
</section>

    <div class="rel-article-wrapper clearfix " id="more-on-smartphones-related-articles">

    <div class="rel-article crux-background-gray-bg related-links-multiple" id="more-on-smartphones-related-articles-links">
        <div class="crux-label-style">More on Smartphones</div>
                                    <div class="rel-link">
                    <a href="https://www.consumerreports.org/products/cell-phones-200703/smartphones-28726/view2/" class="crux-article__bold-link crux-article__bold-link--small">CR's Smartphone Ratings & Buying Guide</a>
                </div>
                                                <div class="rel-link">
                    <a href="https://www.consumerreports.org/electronics-computers/cell-phones/iphone-15-pro-max-passes-drop-test-a9052597453/" class="crux-article__bold-link crux-article__bold-link--small">Does the iPhone 15 Pro Max Pass CR's Drop Test?</a>
                </div>
                                                <div class="rel-link">
                    <a href="https://www.consumerreports.org/electronics-computers/cell-phones/iphone-15-lineup-drops-lightning-adopts-usb-c-a2241583701/" class="crux-article__bold-link crux-article__bold-link--small">New iPhone 15 Lineup Drops Lightning, Adopts USB-C</a>
                </div>
                                                <div class="rel-link">
                    <a href="https://www.consumerreports.org/smartphones/pros-and-cons-of-buying-an-iphone-directly-from-apple-a9272088706/" class="crux-article__bold-link crux-article__bold-link--small">Pros and Cons of Buying an iPhone from Apple</a>
                </div>
                                                <div class="rel-link">
                    <a href="https://www.consumerreports.org/extended-warranties/is-applecare-plus-worth-buying-for-your-iphone-a8095516790/" class="crux-article__bold-link crux-article__bold-link--small">Is AppleCare+ Worth Buying for Your iPhone?</a>
                </div>
                        </div>

    <div class="text-container crux-article" id="more-on-smartphones-related-articles-text">
        <p>Those are hefty sums, but largely competitive with other higher-end smartphones, including the Samsung Galaxy S22 lineup that debuted earlier this year.</p>
<p>All four models use a common <a href="https://www.consumerreports.org/electronics-computers/cell-phones/usb-c-vs-lightning-what-iphone-owners-need-to-know-a3649560345/">USB-C port</a> to charge instead of Apple’s proprietary Lightning port, which may simplify cable management and improve data transfer speeds. The Pro models have a new titanium finish. (The Pro Max adds up to 5x optical zoom, as well.) The more basic models receive the <a href="https://www.consumerreports.org/electronics-computers/cell-phones/iphone-14-upgrades-and-pricing-a8907871952/">Dynamic Island</a> introduced on the 14 and 14 Plus models a year ago.</p>
<p>Alongside Apple itself, all three major wireless carriers—AT&T, T-Mobile, and Verizon—are offering trade-in deals that may make an iPhone 15 upgrade even more compelling. They require you to have good credit, though, and a trade-in phone, ideally in good condition.</p>
<p>These offers are typically marketed as being available for a limited time, so if they sound compelling to you, you should act relatively quickly.</p>
    </div>

</div>
    <section id="apple-deals" class="cda-heading-block-wrapper ">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-12">
            <div class="cda-article-heading crux-article">
                <div class="cda-section-heading">
            <h2 class="crux-section-header">Apple Deals</h2>
</div>
            </div>
            <div class="cda-article__text crux-article">
                <p>Apple doesn’t have any iPhone 15-specific deals. But if you trade in an eligible device, you can receive $40 to $650 in credit for a new iPhone. To see what your old phone is worth, you need to answer a few questions <a href="https://www.apple.com/shop/buy-iphone/iphone-15">on Apple’s website</a>.</p>
<p>Once Apple has received and evaluated the trade-in, the credit is instantly applied to whatever form of payment you used to make the purchase. If you opt for a carrier deal instead, the discount comes in the form of bill credits spread out over 24 or 36 months. Cancel wireless service early and you have to pay the remaining balance on the phone.</p>
<p>If you use the Apple Card credit card to complete the transaction, you can get 3 percent cash back on the iPhone and other Apple Store purchases.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>
    <div class="cda-call-to-action cda-article__text ">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-12">
            <div class="crux-article">
                                    <div class="cda-section-heading">
            <h2 class="crux-section-header">Watch the iPhone 15 Pro Max Drop Test</h2>
</div>
                                <p><b>Viral videos claim the phone cracks easily. <a href="https://www.consumerreports.org/video/view/electronics/news/6338114736112/does-the-iphone-15-pro-max-break-easily-we-test-the-claim/">See what CR’s test found</a>.</b></p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
    <section id="wireless-carrier-deals" class="cda-heading-block-wrapper ">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-12">
            <div class="cda-article-heading crux-article">
                <div class="cda-section-heading">
            <h2 class="crux-section-header">Wireless Carrier Deals</h2>
</div>
            </div>
            <div class="cda-article__text crux-article">
                <p>All three carriers are offering up to $1,000 off the price of a new iPhone to new and existing customers. The differences between the offers are detailed below.</p>
<p><strong>AT&T</strong><br><a href="https://www.att.com/buy/phones/browse/apple/">AT&T</a> is offering new and existing Unlimited plan customers up to $1,000 off an iPhone 15 Pro or Pro Max. For the iPhone 15 or 15 Plus, the discount maxes out at $850. This means you can potentially get an iPhone 15 Pro or an iPhone 15 for free.</p>
<p>Devices eligible for the $1,000 credit include an iPhone Pro Max from the 12, 13, or 14 series; Samsung’s Z Flip4, Z Fold4, S22 Ultra 5G, S23, S23+, and S23 Ultra; and Google’s Pixel 7 Pro. </p>
<p>The deal comes in the form of 36 monthly bill credits that start within three months of the trade-in.</p>
<p><strong>T-Mobile</strong><br><a href="https://www.t-mobile.com/offers/apple-iphone-deals?INTNAV=tNav%3ADeals%3AApple">T-Mobile</a> is offering new and existing customers on its Go5G Next and Go5G Plus plans up to $1,000 off on any iPhone 15 model. New and existing customers on its Magenta Max plan can receive up to $650 off. There are additional discounts for customers on the carrier’s less expensive plans.</p>
<p>Devices eligible for the $1,000 credit include an iPhone Pro or Pro Max from the 11, 12, 13, and 14 series and Samsung’s S21 Ultra, S22 Ultra, S23 Ultra, Z Fold 3, Z Fold 4, Z Flip 3, Z Flip4, and Note20 Ultra.</p>
<p>All deals provide the discount via 24 monthly bill credits. </p>
<p><strong>Verizon<br></strong>Verizon is offering new customers and existing customers who add a line on their Ultimate Unlimited plan up to $1,000 off the price of either iPhone 15 Pro model. For the iPhone 15 and 15 Plus, the maximum discounts are $830 and $930, respectively. Smaller discounts are available for customers on the carrier’s less expensive Unlimited Plus and Unlimited Welcome plans.</p>
<p>The company says it will accept any model of phone in any condition as a trade-in. To see how much your old phone is worth, you have to visit <a href="https://www.verizon.com/smartphones/apple/">Verizon’s online store,</a> select the iPhone 15 model you’re interested in buying, and enter the info requested in the trade-in wizard.</p>
<p>The company has a few other deals, too, offering 25 percent off Apple’s MagSafe chargers, 20 percent off select cases and screen protectors for iPhone 15 models, and a $280 discount on an eligible iPad when you purchase a 5G iPhone and cell service for the iPad.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</section>
                        <div id="monetate_selectorHTML_af9796ac_0" class="monetate_selectorHTML_af9796ac"><div class="guardian-cta" id="mt-default-inline-donation">
<div class="guardian-cta__text">
<p>For 85 years, we have been fighting to make sure you get a fair deal and safe products. Our scientists, engineers, journalists, and researchers work tirelessly to bring consumers like you trusted information, so you have the answers you need. Not just so you can buy an appliance or car with confidence, but also so that you can know what’s safe for you and your family. As a nonprofit organization, we rely on the support of our members to help raise the standards of the products and services we use every day. Every donation, no matter the size, contributes to this work. <span class="guardian-cta__text--highlighted">Please support Consumer Reports today — even a gift of as little as $3 will help. Thank you.</span></p>
</div>

        <script type="module">
const initDataLayer = (CR = {}) => {
  const { userInfo, pageProps, getLayout } = CR;

  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || []

  let additionDataLayer = pageProps.gtm

  try {
    additionDataLayer = extendDataLayer(pageProps.gtm);
  } catch (e) {
    console.error('Google Tag Manager dataLayer init:', e.message);
  }

  window.dataLayer.push(additionDataLayer);

  function extendDataLayer(data) {
    const newData = {
      ...data,
      erightsId: userInfo.getErightsId(),
      userId: userInfo.getId(),
      segment: userInfo.getSegment(),
      subsOwned: userInfo.getSubscriptions(),
      tier: userInfo.getTier(),
      siteLayout: getLayout(),
    }

    
    
    return newData
  }
}

const fetchGtm = (w, d, s, l, i) => {
  w[l] = w[l] || [];
  w[l].push({ 'gtm.start': new Date().getTime(), event: 'gtm.js' });
  var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0], j = d.createElement(s), dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
  j.defer = true;
  j.src = '//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
  f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
};

let gtmRequested = false;

const initGtm = () => {
    if (gtmRequested) {
        return false;
    }
    gtmRequested = true;

    initDataLayer(window.CR);
    fetchGtm(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-N8GSGR');
}

const initGtmOnTimeout = (delay = 4000) => {
    setTimeout(initGtm, delay);
};

const initGtmOnEvent = (event) => {
    initGtm();
    event.currentTarget.removeEventListener(event.type, initGtmOnEvent);
};

document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    initGtmOnTimeout();
});
document.addEventListener('wheel', initGtmOnEvent);
document.addEventListener('mousemove', initGtmOnEvent);
document.addEventListener('mousedown', initGtmOnEvent);
document.addEventListener('keydown', initGtmOnEvent);
document.addEventListener('touchstart', initGtmOnEvent);
</script>

	mtgAlert.init = function () {
        let closedCookie = mtgAlert.readCookie(mtgAlert.constants.CLOSED_COOKIE_NAME);
        if (mtgAlert.checkIfEbsco()) {
            return;
        }
		if (closedCookie && closedCookie === 'true') {
			return;
		}
		mtgAlert.showAlert();
	};
	/**
	 * Starts the application
	 *
	 * @return undefined
	 */
	mtgAlert.start = function () {
		//inject the alert
		mtgAlert.injectAlert();

		//bind the close button
		mtgAlert.bindCloseButton();

		//bind alert user`s clicks
		// mtgAlert.bindAlertClick();
	};
	/**
	 * Adds custom CSS to the page
	 *
	 * @param cssText - string - css to add to an embedded stylesheet
	 *
	 * @return undefined
	 */
	mtgAlert.addCustomCss = function (cssText) {

        var styleSheet = document.createElement('style');
        styleSheet.classList.add(`globalAlert_V1__style`);

        if(!cssText) return;

        styleSheet.innerHTML = cssText;

        document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0].appendChild(styleSheet);
	};

	/**
	 * Returns HTML for the alert component
	 *
	 * @return string
	 */
	mtgAlert.getAlertHtml = function () {
		let firstName = window.CR.userInfo.getFirstName();
		let container = document.createElement('div');
		container.classList.add('globalAlert_V1__container');
		container.innerHTML = `
			<div href="javascript:{}" class="globalAlert_V1__close" role="button" aria-label="close"><img src="https://mt.consumerreports.org/sb/img/1/1156/2390474.png" alt="close"/></div>
			<div class="globalAlert_V1__image" aria-hidden=true ></div>
			<div class="globalAlert_V1__container_text">
				<div class="globalAlert_V1__header_text">${firstName ? firstName + ', ' : ''}Can We Count On YOU?</div>
				<div class="globalAlert_V1__text globalAlert_V1__item_desktop">Safer products. More sustainable choices. Stronger digital protections. Fair Deals. <span class="mt_bold_text">We need 50 new monthly donors this week</span> to help support our vital product testing! Will you be our newest Consumer Champion?</div>
				<div class="globalAlert_V1__text globalAlert_V1__item_mobile globalAlert_V1__item_tablet">Safer products. More sustainable choices. Fair Deals. <span class="mt_bold_text">We need 50 new monthly donors this week</span> to help make it happen! Will you be our newest Consumer Champion?</div>
			</div>
		`;
		container.appendChild(mtgAlert.attachDonations());

		return container;
	};

	mtgAlert.isMobile = function () {
		if (window.innerWidth < 768) return 'mobile';
		if (window.innerWidth < 1200) return 'tablet';
		return 'desktop';
	}

	mtgAlert.showAlertOnScroll = function () {
		if ((window.pageYOffset + window.innerHeight) > (mtgAlert.constants.SCROLL_DELAY * document.body.clientHeight)){
			mtgAlert.start();
			document.removeEventListener('scroll', mtgAlert.showAlertOnScroll)
		}
	};

	mtgAlert.getDonationConfig = function () {
		// if (window.CR.userInfo.getFirstName()) {
		// 	return mtgAlert.constants.donations['digital'][mtgAlert.isMobile() ? 'mobile' : 'desktop'];	
		// } else {
			return mtgAlert.constants.donations['anon'][mtgAlert.isMobile() === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop'];
			// return mtgAlert.constants.donations['anon'][mtgAlert.isMobile() ? 'mobile' : 'desktop'];
		// }
		// if (window.CR.userInfo.getTier() === 'EMAIL') return mtgAlert.constants.donations['email'][mtgAlert.isMobile() ? 'mobile' : 'desktop'];
		// return mtgAlert.constants.donations['digital'][mtgAlert.isMobile() ? 'mobile' : 'desktop'];
	}

	mtgAlert.attachDonations = function () {
		const wrapper = document.createElement('div');
		wrapper.classList.add('globalAlert_V1__links');
		const text = document.createElement('div');
		text.classList.add('crux-label-style');
		text.innerText = 'COUNT ME IN';
		wrapper.appendChild(text);
		const donations = document.createDocumentFragment();
		const urlRegex = /(?:[{])(\w+)(?:[}])/ig;
		let obj = mtgAlert.getDonationConfig();
		for (let key in obj) {
			let amount = isNaN(key) ? key : '$' + key;
			let url = mtgAlert.constants.TARGET_URL.replace(urlRegex, (match, group) => {
				return (group && obj[key][group] ? obj[key][group] : '');
			});
			let item = document.createElement('div');
			item.classList.add('mt-list-item');
			item.innerHTML = `<a href="${url}" class="globalAlert_V1__link-${mtgAlert.isMobile()}" target="_blank" data-trackpagelink="['${mtgAlert.constants.TRACKING_NAME}-${key}']">${amount}</a>`;
			item.addEventListener('click', () => {
				mtgAlert.setAlertClosedCookie();
				mtgAlert.closeAlert();
			});
			donations.appendChild(item);
		}
		wrapper.appendChild(donations);
		return wrapper;
	}
	/**
	 * Injects the alert into the page
	 *
	 * @return undefined
	 */
	mtgAlert.injectAlert = function () {

		// * removes the border under the categories in GNAV * //
		// document.querySelector('#g-nav-new-container .cda-gnav__category-inner').style.border = 'none';

		let alertNode = document.createElement('div');
		alertNode.classList.add(`globalAlert_V1__wrapper`);
		alertNode.appendChild(mtgAlert.getAlertHtml('desktop'));
        if (mtgAlert.constants.MOBILE_MODAL){
			let background = document.createElement('div');
			background.classList.add('globalAlert_V1__modal_background');
			alertNode.appendChild(background)
		}

		let alertNodeMobile = document.createElement('div');
		alertNodeMobile.classList.add(`globalAlert_V1__wrapper_mobile`);
		alertNodeMobile.appendChild(mtgAlert.getAlertHtml('mobile'));
        if (mtgAlert.constants.MOBILE_MODAL){
			let background = document.createElement('div');
			background.classList.add('globalAlert_V1__modal_background');
			alertNodeMobile.appendChild(background)
		}

        // document.querySelector('body').insertBefore(alertNode, document.querySelector('body').firstChild);
		switch (mtgAlert.isMobile()) {
			case 'mobile':
				if (document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.MOBILE_ID)) {
					document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.MOBILE_ID).innerHTML = '';
					document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.MOBILE_ID).appendChild(alertNodeMobile);
				} else {
					document.querySelector(mtgAlert.constants.DESKTOP_NO_CONTAINER).parentElement.insertBefore(alertNodeMobile, document.querySelector(mtgAlert.constants.DESKTOP_NO_CONTAINER));
				}
				break;
			case 'tablet':
				if (document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.TABLET_ID)) {
					document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.TABLET_ID).innerHTML = '';
					document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.TABLET_ID).appendChild(alertNode);
				} else {
					document.querySelector(mtgAlert.constants.DESKTOP_NO_CONTAINER).parentElement.insertBefore(alertNode, document.querySelector(mtgAlert.constants.DESKTOP_NO_CONTAINER));
				}
				break;
			case 'desktop':
				if (document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.DESKTOP_ID)) {
					document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.DESKTOP_ID).innerHTML = '';
					document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.DESKTOP_ID).appendChild(alertNode);
				} else {
					document.querySelector(mtgAlert.constants.DESKTOP_NO_CONTAINER).parentElement.insertBefore(alertNode, document.querySelector(mtgAlert.constants.DESKTOP_NO_CONTAINER));
				}
				break;
		}
		if (mtgAlert.isMobile() === 'mobile' && mtgAlert.constants.MOBILE_MODAL){
			let desktopAlert = document.querySelector(`.globalAlert_V1__wrapper`);
			let mobileAlert = document.querySelector(`.globalAlert_V1__wrapper_mobile`);
			let tabletAlert = document.querySelector(`.globalAlert_V1__wrapper_tablet`);
			setTimeout(()=> {
				if(desktopAlert || mobileAlert || tabletAlert){
					mtgAlert.closeAlert();
					mtgAlert.setAlertClosedCookie();
				}
			}, mtgAlert.constants.SET_CLOSE_DELAY);
		}

        // Action impression reporting
		window.monetateQ = window.monetateQ || [];
		window.monetateQ.push(['trackActionEvent', [{
			eventType: 'op_impression',
			actionId: mtgAlert.constants.MT_ACTION_ID
		}]]);
          window.monetateQ.push(['trackActionEvent', [{
			eventType: 'op_click',
			actionId: mtgAlert.constants.MT_ACTION_ID
		}]]);
	};


	mtgAlert.getAlertContainer = function () {
		return document.getElementsByClassName(`globalAlert_V1__wrapper`)[0];
	};

	mtgAlert.showAlert = function() {
		if (!mtgAlert.getAlertContainer() || mtgAlert.getAlertContainer().length <= 0) {
			//inject the custom CSS
			mtgAlert.addCustomCss(mtgAlert.getCssText());

			//start the application
			if (mtgAlert.isMobile() === 'mobile' && mtgAlert.constants.MOBILE_MODAL){
				document.addEventListener('scroll', mtgAlert.showAlertOnScroll)
			} else {
				mtgAlert.start();
			}
		}
	};

	mtgAlert.readCookie = function(name) {
		var i = 0,
			c = '',
			nameEQ = name + '=',
			ca = document.cookie.split(';');

		for (;i < ca.length;i++) {
			c = ca[i];
			while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
				c = c.substring(1,c.length);
			}

			if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) === 0) {
				return c.substring(nameEQ.length, c.length);
			}
		}

		return null;
	};


	mtgAlert.createCookie = function(name, value, days) {
		var expires = '',
			date = null;

		if (days) {
			date = new Date();
			date.setTime(date.getTime() + (days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
			expires = '; expires=' + date.toGMTString();
		} else {
			expires = '';
		}

		var cookie = name + '=' + value  + expires + '; path=/; domain=' + mtgAlert.getCookieDomain();

		document.cookie = cookie;

		return true;
	};

	mtgAlert.getCookieDomain = function() {
		return document.location.host.replace(/^.*?(([^.]+\.[^.:]+)(?:[:]\d{2,})?)$/, '.$2');
	};

	mtgAlert.bindCloseButton = function () {
        [...document.getElementsByClassName(`globalAlert_V1__close`)].forEach(btn => {
			btn.addEventListener('click', function(e){
				e.stopPropagation();
	
				//hide alert
				mtgAlert.closeAlert();
				//set the closed cookie
				mtgAlert.setAlertClosedCookie();
			});
		})
	};

	mtgAlert.setAlertClosedCookie = function () {
		mtgAlert.createCookie(mtgAlert.constants.CLOSED_COOKIE_NAME, 'true', mtgAlert.constants.CLOSED_COOKIE_DURATION);
	};

	mtgAlert.closeAlert = function () {
		let desktopAlert = document.querySelector(`.globalAlert_V1__wrapper`);
		let mobileAlert = document.querySelector(`.globalAlert_V1__wrapper_mobile`);
		let desktopContainer = document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.DESKTOP_ID);
		let mobileContainer = document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.MOBILE_ID);
		let tabletContainer = document.getElementById(mtgAlert.constants.TABLET_ID);
		[desktopAlert, mobileAlert, desktopContainer, mobileContainer, tabletContainer].forEach(el => {
			if (el) el.style.display = "none";
		});
		document.querySelector('#g-nav-new-container .cda-gnav__category-inner').removeAttribute('style');
	}

    mtgAlert.checkIfEbsco = function() {
        let cookieVal = mtgAlert.readCookie('userInfo');
        if (!cookieVal || cookieVal.length <= 0) return;

        let name = cookieVal.split('&').find(v => {
            return v.indexOf('EBSCO_CRO_USER') !== -1
        });

        return !!name;
    };

    mtgAlert.init();
	// });
})(window);</script><style class="globalAlert_V1__style">

        'use strict';
        let hoverInit = () => {

            let signupButton = document.querySelector('.cda-gnav__main-user-item a.cda-gnav__non-member--shown');
            hoverBox.classList.add('mt-hover-hidden');
            signupButton.addEventListener('mouseover', () => {
                hoverBox.classList.remove('mt-hover-hidden');
                hoverBox.classList.remove('mt-hover-hide-box');
                hoverBox.classList.add('mt-hover-show-box');
                callAdobeTrack();
            });
            signupButton.addEventListener('mouseout', () => {
                hoverBox.classList.remove('mt-hover-hidden');
                hoverBox.classList.add('mt-hover-hide-box');
                hoverBox.classList.remove('mt-hover-show-box');
            });
            hoverBox.addEventListener('mouseover', () => {
                hoverBox.classList.remove('mt-hover-hidden');
                hoverBox.classList.remove('mt-hover-hide-box');
                hoverBox.classList.add('mt-hover-show-box');
            });
            hoverBox.addEventListener('mouseout', () => {
                hoverBox.classList.remove('mt-hover-hidden');
                hoverBox.classList.add('mt-hover-hide-box');
                hoverBox.classList.remove('mt-hover-show-box');
            });
            hoverBox.style.removeProperty("display");
        }
        let callAdobeTrack = () => {
            let s = null;
            s = window.s_gi(window.s_account);
            s.linkTrackVars = 'prop48,eVar48,prop72,eVar72,prop58,evar58';
            s.eVar48 = s.pageName + ' | subscribe_step1_hover-header';
            s.prop48 = s.eVar48;
            s.tl(this, 'o', 'subscribe_step1_hover-header');
        }
        if (document.readyState != 'loading') {
            hoverInit();
        } else {
            document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', hoverInit);
        }

    })(document, window);</script><style class="cda-ratings__style">.cda-ratings__wrapper {border-top: 5px solid #F0F0F0;border-bottom: 1px solid #C8C8C8;padding: 40px 20px
